item.description:
Hey Fellow Baby Boomers:  Check it out -

The New Exhibit - JFK 50 Years - Celebrate the past - check out this link

http://www.jfk50.org/

We were there, growing up, lets revisit together on Saturday, March 19th.

 

Your Public library can give you a $3 pass to admit 2.  Full price is $12.00 without a pass.

Take the T to the library and we can get to Amrheims Pub -617.268.6189

(80 West Broadway) South Boston the same way.
item.how_to_find_us: lobby entrance, don't forget to get pass from your city library
item.why: George suggested it!!! let's start out at the library in Dorchester around 2p and after seeing the museum, library, and exhibits, we'll take the T or drive to South Boston and grab beers and food at Amrheins.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: JFK Museum and Library followed by Amrhein's Pub
